metadata.title: CVE-2020-36829 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The Mojolicious module before 8.65 for Perl is vulnerable to secure_comparetiming attacks that allow an attacker to guess the length of a secretstring. Only versions after 1.74 are affected.

criterions.comment: libmojolicious-perl package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
